_header: Dives and Lazarus the Scripture sayeth plain
_description: On the punishments for evil and rewards for good — seven couplets

BLAdd60577.First Lines:
Diues and lazarus þe scripture saythe playnethe one in welth
                    þe othe other in great payne…
BLAdd60577.Last Lines:
…Frome þe wich torment good lord deliuer vsby the pascion
                    & death of our lord cryst Iesus
BLAdd60577.Facsimiles:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             “Introduction.” 
             The Winchester Anthology. A Facsimile of British Library Additional
                Manuscript 60577. With an account of the music by 
                    Iain
                    Fenlon. 
         Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1981.
